The [[Germany]] facility was infiltrated by a group of anarchists known as the [[Spammers (Earth-616)|Spammers]].{{r|Cable & Deadpool #2}}
Sunic hired the [[Edward Lansky (Earth-616)|Lightmaster]] to develop a more stable version of the virus.{{r|Cable & Deadpool #4}}
Lightmaster was then confronted and defeated by [[Nathan Summers (Earth-616)|Cable]].{{r|Cable & Deadpool #5}}
